about_the_game:
Welcome to The Gas Station, a nerve-wracking survival horror experience set in the desolate heart of nowhere. As the night shift worker at a lonely gas station, your routine starts with mundane tasks—restocking shelves, taking out the trash, keeping the power on. But the deeper into the night you go, the more unsettling the events become. Eerie phone calls. Shadows moving where they shouldn’t. What starts as an ordinary shift spirals into a nightmare you can't escape.

In The Gas Station, every decision matters, with multiple endings that keep you on edge until the very last moment. Will you survive the hostile activity, make it to dawn, and live? Or will your curiosity—or fear— be the cause of your death?

Features:

  • Dynamic Tasks: Keep the station running while terror builds around you. The more you do, the worse it gets.

  • Multiple Endings: Drive away, uncover the killer’s hideout, or fight for survival in a basement torture chamber. Your fate is in your hands.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience the haunting isolation of a lonely gas station, complete with PS1-style visuals and atmospheric sound effects.

You clock in for a quiet night. But will you clock out alive? Welcome to the most terrifying shift of your life.

content_descriptors.notes:
The Gas Station contains:
depiction and enactment of suicide. 
Frequent blood, gore and dismemberment.
depictions and references to alcohol consumption and drug use
